Entries.13609012/f Sandy 750/f Emily 750/e 13609: 50s/15 24/farmer -30 -30 0 Emily 13 24 0 Sandy 14 23 2/skippable/pause 1000/speak Sandy "...I really appreciate you mending the tear in this skirt, Emily.$s"/pause 200/speak Emily "Oh, yeah, of course Sandy!#$b#How'd you end up tearing it anyway?$3"/pause 200/pause 200/emote Sandy 60/pause 500/speak Sandy "Well... I went out dancing last night--"/pause 100/speak Emily "Did you try to do a split on the dancefloor again?$6"/pause 200/speak Sandy "No, no... my skirt got caught on something, I swear!$h"/pause 200/emote Sandy 56/pause 200/speak Sandy "Wow, Em. I can't believe you remember that!$h"/pause 200/pause 200/speak Emily "Like I'd ever forget it!#$b#It's been how many years? Ten?$3"/pause 200/textAboveHead Sandy "At least!"/pause 500/pause 200/speak Emily "You had taken me to Zuzu City to go dancing."/pause 200/textAboveHead Sandy "You love dancing!"/pause 500/speak Emily "Everything was going so well. The music was great. The energy was great... but then things got a little too festive..."/pause 200/speak Sandy "And suddenly I got the bright idea to do a split in that dress...$h"/pause 200/speak Emily "I made you that dress!"/pause 200/speak Sandy "Yes, and it looked amazing!"/pause 200/speak Emily "Well, I don't know about that... it was one of my first attempts.$3#$b#But it did look amazing on *you*. Everything always does.$l"/pause 200/emote Sandy 32/pause 200/emote Emily 28/pause 200/speak Sandy "Oh, come on, Emily, don't sell yourself short. Your creations have always been beautiful.#$b#You have that magic touch.$h"/pause 200/emote Emily 32/pause 500/speak Sandy "And of course, you also came to my rescue! I had barely even realized what happened before you were whipping out a scarf from who knows where, and wrapping me up so I wouldn't be embarrassed.$h"/pause 200/speak Emily "Oh, you know me... always happy to help a friend.$3"/pause 400/faceDirection Emily 1 true/speak Emily "All done! Good as new."/move Emily 1 0 0/pause 200/emote Sandy 20/pause 400/speak Sandy "You know, Em, I really miss those days... I've missed... $s"/pause 300/emote Emily 8/pause 300/emote Sandy 28/speak Sandy "I... well, I've missed it here...$s"/pause 200/speak Emily "Well, now that the bus is back in service, we never have to be strangers to each other again."/pause 200/emote Sandy 32/speak Sandy "You're right Emily. Thanks for not giving up on me... and our friendship."/pause 200/emote Emily 32/pause 200/emote Sandy 32/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.13609013/f Sandy 1250/f Emily 1250/e 136: nightTime/42 72/farmer -30 -30 0 Emily -30 -30 2 Sandy -30 -30 2/skippable/pause 1200/warp Sandy 45 72/playSound doorClose/move Sandy -7 0 3 true/pause 1000/warp Emily 45 72/playSound doorClose/pause 200/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 200/speak Emily "Sandy, wait up!"/pause 200/emote Sandy 16/faceDirection Sandy 1/pause 200/move Sandy 6 0 1/pause 300/speak Emily "It's pretty late... and it's such a long walk to the bus stop. Why don't you just stay at my place tonight?$h"/pause 500/speak Sandy "Oh, that would be great, Emily.$h#$b#I do hate trudging through the snow back to the bus."/pause 200/textAboveHead Emily "Let's go."/pause 200/move Sandy -6 0 3 true/move Emily -6 0 3 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/halt/changeLocation HaleyHouse/warp Emily 21 4/faceDirection Emily 3/warp Sandy 19 4/faceDirection Sandy 1/stopMusic/pause 700/fade/viewport 18 7/pause 200/speak Sandy "Are you sure you're comfortable, Em? I can sleep on the couch.$s"/pause 200/speak Emily "I won't hear anything of the sort, Sandy! The bed easily fits two people.$3"/pause 200/emote Sandy 32/pause 200/speak Sandy "So... have you heard from your parents lately?$s"/pause 200/emote Emily 28/speak Emily "No...$s#$b#Sometimes I don't think they're ever coming back.$s#$b#I know Haley and I are adults, and we can take care of ourselves, but I still miss them.$3#$b#I think Haley does too, but she doesn't want to let on...$s"/pause 200/emote Sandy 28/pause 200/speak Emily "And sometimes it's so hard managing this whole household by myself.$3#$b#Haley's here, but you know how she is. I love her, but it's so difficult to get her to help out... and I think she hates my cooking.$3"/emote Sandy 60/pause 200/speak Sandy "I'm sorry, Em. I know it's tough.$s"/pause 300/emote Sandy 16/pause 200/speak Sandy "Oh, hey, how about when I visit on Sundays, I make the two of you brunch?"/pause 200/speak Emily "Oh, I couldn't ask you to do that! You're supposed to be a guest.$3"/pause 200/speak Sandy "Oh, please, I insist! It'll be one less thing for you to do. And besides, I enjoy cooking.#$b#Maybe I'll even manage to find something Haley likes to eat.$h"/pause 200/emote Emily 32/speak Emily "Well if you really don't mind, I'd love that!$h#$b#I always have loved your cooking."/pause 200/emote Sandy 32/textAboveHead Sandy "Great!"/pause 500/emote Emily 32/pause 200/speak Emily "We should probably try and get some sleep.$3#$b#I wouldn't want to wake up Haley with our chattering.$3"/pause 200/speak Sandy "Oh, yes, I know how cranky she gets when she doesn't get enough 'beauty sleep.'$h"/pause 200/textAboveHead Emily "Good night, Sandy!"/pause 200/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/showFrame Emily 39/pause 1500/textAboveHead Sandy "Hey, Em?"/pause 1200/textAboveHead Sandy "Em?"/pause 1200/emote Emily 24/pause 1200/emote Sandy 28/pause 1000/faceDirection Sandy 2/textAboveHead Sandy "*sigh*"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.13609014/f Sandy 1750/f Emily 1500/e 136: distantBanjo/8 5/farmer -30 -30 0 Sandy 2 5 2/skippable/pause 1000/warp farmer 4 8 0/playSound doorClose/pause 200/textAboveHead Sandy "Em--? oh, it's you..."/pause 800/move farmer 0 -3 3/faceDirection Sandy 1/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Sandy "For a second, I thought you were Emily, that's all.$s"/pause 1000/emote Sandy 28/pause 200/question null "#Is everything okay Sandy?#What am I, chopped liver?"/emote Sandy 60/pause 1000/splitSpeak Sandy "Sure, everything's peachy...$s~No, of course not @...$s"/pause 500/emote Sandy 28/pause 200/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 200/textAboveHead Sandy "*sigh*"/pause 500/speak Sandy "Can I confide in you, @?$s"/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Sandy "It's been really nice... being back in the Valley... hanging out with new people... reconnecting with Emily...#$b#I'd almost forgotten how much she means to me..."/pause 200/emote Sandy 60/pause 200/speak Sandy "And I think if you were to ask her, she'd say I'm like family to her... $s"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 200/faceDirection Sandy 3/speak Sandy "...except well, I don't really think of *her* as family...$s"/pause 100/emote Sandy 28/faceDirection Sandy 1/pause 200/speak Sandy "I think of her as more than a friend...$s#$b#Do you understand what I'm saying, @?$s"/pause 300/jump farmer 4/emote farmer 16/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 300/speak Sandy "But I haven't told her because we've been friends for so long!$s#$b#If she doesn't feel the same way, it would ruin everything.$s#$b#I don't think I'd be able to show my face in Pelican Town again. It would be too awkward and painful.$s"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 300/question null "What would you do in my shoes?#I would tell her.#You have to do what's best for you..."/pause 200/emote Sandy 28/speak Sandy "Really?...$s#$b#I guess I'll have to think about this some more.$s#$b#Promise me you won't say anything to Emily regardless of what I decide...?$s"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 300/emote farmer 40/speak Sandy "Thanks, sweetie."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.13609015/f Emily 2000/e 13609014/w sunny: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Emily 64 18 0/skippable/pause 1200/emote Emily 32/speak Emily "Hi, @!"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 200/speak Emily "I wanted to talk to you about something... about Sandy actually.$3"/pause 300/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Emily "You see, @, having Sandy back has brought back wonderful memories.#$b#Even though I'm surrounded by friends and family here, I still really missed her presence in my life.$3#$b#I hadn't realized how much until the bus got fixed."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 200/showFrame Emily 27/pause 200/emote Emily 28/pause 200/speak Emily "I feel like such a hypocrite, though. Here I am trying to tell people to be true to themselves and live their best life...$3"/pause 200/emote Emily 60/pause 200/speak Emily "Meanwhile, I'm too afraid to tell my best friend I love her.$l"/pause 200/jump farmer 4/emote farmer 16/pause 200/showFrame Emily 0/pause 200/faceDirection Emily 0/pause 200/speak Emily "What should I do, @?"/pause 200/question null "#Tell her, you might be surprised.#You should be telling her this, not me."/pause 300/emote Emily 16/splitSpeak Emily "You really think so?!$h~Well that was a little terse... but point taken.$3"/pause 200/speak Emily "Okay, @. I'm going to do it.#$b#Thank you for giving me the courage I needed."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.13609016/f Sandy 2250/e 13609014/e 13609: none/18 6/farmer -30 -30 0 Emily 16 5 2 Sandy 16 10 0/addObject 17 6 458/addConversationTopic SandyEmilyDating 14/skippable/pause 1200/textAboveHead Emily "Hi, Sandy!"/pause 500/textAboveHead Sandy "Oh, what pretty flowers!"/move Sandy 0 -2 0/move Sandy -2 0 3/move Sandy 0 -2 1/pause 500/speak Sandy "Hey, Em, should I get started on brunch? I was thinking of maybe making a burger. I managed to convince Gus to lend me special secret sauce, but he still won't tell me what's in it. Maybe we can figure it out together.$h"/pause 1500/emote Sandy 28/pause 500/textAboveHead Sandy "Emily?"/pause 500/speak Emily "Oh, sure Sandy, that sounds great.$3"/pause 200/emote Sandy 60/pause 500/speak Sandy "Is everything okay, Emily?$s#$b#You seem a bit distracted.$s"/pause 500/speak Emily "Yeah, everything's great! I actually wanted to talk to you...$l"/pause 200/speak Sandy "Oh? What about?"/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 1/pause 500/move Emily 1 0 1/pause 500/emote Emily 28/pause 200/faceDirection Emily 3/speak Emily "Well, you see Sandy--$l"/playMusic heavy/pause 1200/jump Sandy 4/emote Sandy 16/pause 200/speak Emily "Oh... Sam must be practicing again.$3"/pause 500/speak Sandy "What were you trying to tell me?$s"/pause 200/speak Emily "Oh, well, maybe we should wait until Sam finishes practicing.$3"/pause 1000/emote Sandy 28/stopMusic/pause 500/emote Sandy 16/speak Emily "Ah... that's better.$u"/pause 200/speak Emily "So as I was saying Sandy...$l"/pause 100/doAction 14 4/emote Sandy 16/pause 200/doAction 14 4/pause 100/emote Emily 12/pause 100/doAction 14 4/pause 200/move Emily 0 -1 0/move Emily -2 0 3/doAction 14 4/textAboveHead Emily "Shhh..."/pause 1000/faceDirection Sandy 0/speak Sandy "Emily, I get the feeling you're trying to tell me something important..."/pause 200/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 200/emote Emily 28/pause 200/speak Emily "I am... but I wanted things to be just right.$s"/pause 200/move Emily 0 1 3/move Sandy 0 -1 1/pause 500/move Emily 3 0 2/move Emily 0 1 3/speak Emily "Sandy I bought these flowers for you.$l"/pause 200/emote Sandy 16/speak Sandy "Wait, is that--?"/speak Emily "I wanted to tell you how happy I am that you're back in my life."/pause 200/emote Sandy 32/pause 200/speak Emily "I hope you feel the same way and that maybe...$l"/pause 200/emote Sandy 20/move Sandy 2 0 1/speak Sandy "...maybe I'd want to be your girlfriend?"/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 200/emote Emily 16/speak Emily "Yes!$h"/pause 200/speed Emily 3/move Emily 0 -1 3/speed Emily 3/move Emily -1 0 3/speak Sandy "Oh, Emily, I'm so happy!$h#$b#I've been so scared to say anything because I wasn't sure you felt the same way, and I didn't want to ruin things."/pause 200/speak Emily "Of course I feel the same way! I think on some level, I always have... $l"/pause 200/emote Sandy 20/positionOffset Sandy 20 -20/showFrame Emily 33/positionOffset Emily -20 0/specificTemporarySprite heart 17 5/pause 1000/positionOffset Sandy -20 20/positionOffset Emily 20 0/showFrame Emily 12/pause 200/emote Emily 20/pause 300/emote Sandy 20/pause 2500/textAboveHead Sandy "Let's start planning our first date!"/pause 300/emote Emily 32/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.13609017/e 13609016/t 2100 2400/w sunny/: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer -30 -30 0 Sandy 28 12 2 Emily 27 12 2/skippable/specificTemporarySprite EmilyCamping/viewport 27 12/pause 5000/speak Sandy "Wow, Em, this was a great idea!$h#$b#I think the last time I went camping was hmmm... well I think it was with you actually!$h"/pause 200/emote Emily 32/pause 500/shake Sandy 3000/pause 200/speak Sandy "I forgot how chilly it gets at night, though."/pause 200/speak Emily "Let's move closer to the fire.$l"/move Sandy 0 1 2 true/move Emily 0 1 2 true/pause 1200/animate Emily false true 250 52 53/pause 250/playSound dwop/positionOffset Emily 4 0/pause 250/pause 250/playSound dwop/positionOffset Emily 4 0/pause 250/pause 250/playSound dwop/positionOffset Emily 4 0/pause 250/pause 250/playSound dwop/positionOffset Emily 4 0/pause 250/pause 250/playSound dwop/positionOffset Emily 4 0/pause 250/pause 250/playSound dwop/positionOffset Emily 4 0/pause 250/pause 250/stopAnimation Emily/pause 3000/showFrame Emily 55/pause 1000/emote Sandy 20/emote Emily 20/pause 1200/speak Sandy "The stars look so beautiful.$h"/pause 1200/speak Emily "I really feel at peace here with you Sandy.$l"/pause 200/emote Sandy 32/speak Sandy "I feel like I'm finally home when I'm with you."/pause 200/emote Emily 32/playMusic spaceMusic/pause 2000/emote Sandy 16/pause 200/speak Sandy "Look, Emily! A shooting star! Quick make a wish!"/pause 250/emote Emily 32/speak Emily "I don't have to... I already got my wish.$l"/pause 200/emote Sandy 20/pause 1500/speak Sandy "I love you, Emily."/pause 300/emote Emily 16/pause 300/showFrame Emily 0/positionOffset Emily -24 0/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 1 true/faceDirection Sandy 3/pause 200/speak Emily "I love you too, Sandy.$l"/pause 1000/emote Sandy 32/pause 100/emote Emily 32/pause 500/speak Sandy "Let's go to bed, Emily."/pause 500/move Emily 0 -1 0/warp Emily -30 -30/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/move Sandy -1 0 0/move Sandy 0 -1 0/warp Sandy -30 -30/playSound grassyStep/pause 1000/viewport move 0 -1 5000/pause 1000/globalFade .003/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.13609010/e 13609017/f Sandy 2500/w sunny: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Emily 64 18 0/pause 1200/emote Emily 32/speak Emily "Good morning, @!#$b#I'm sorry to drop by so early, but I just wanted to invite you to join Sandy and me for brunch today."/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Emily "Great! Entries.13609011/e 13609010/d Mon Tue Wed Thu Fr: sam_acoustic1/16 16/farmer 16 20 0 Emily 16 8 0 Sandy 19 16 0/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 -4 0/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 200/faceDirection Sandy 3/pause 200/speak Sandy "Oh, hi, sweetie! I'm just finishing up these deviled eggs.$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 200/speak Sandy "Oh, don't trouble yourself, you're a guest!$h"/faceDirection Sandy 0/playSound furnace/pause 200/playSound clank/pause 200/speak Sandy "You know, @, I just wanted to thank you."/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Sandy "Oh, you know, for joining forces with Emily and encouraging me to get out more.#$b#And of course, for helping me with my little side project, which I couldn't have gotten off the ground without you.$h"/pause 200/playSound clank/playSound furnace/pause 200/speak Sandy "You know, @... if I hadn't started visiting town more, I don't think I would've gotten together with Emily either. You've been a good friend, and I'm really grateful to you.$h"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/move Emily 0 3 2/doAction 16 12/move Emily 0 5 1/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3/emote Emily 32/playSound clank/speak Emily "Hello, @, I thought I heard you come in!$h#$b#Wait until you taste these deviled eggs Sandy's making. She's a great cook.$h"/pause 200/speak Sandy "Oh, you know, just one of my many hidden talents.$h"/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Emily was right, the eggs were delicious!"/end
